resources.string: Finalice el registro oprimiento el siguente boton
Se muestran varias opciones de imagines
We welcome you to our wet areas area, we have a great variety for you, then you can reserve your space in one of your choice.
I know and agree to comply with the rules

1. The use of the swimming pool is allowed from 09:00 to 19:00. 2. Animals are not allowed. 3. Access to the pool area is only permitted with flip flops. 4. It is mandatory to take a soapy shower before entering the water. 5. All personal items must be kept in a bag. 6. The use of fins, masks, boats, inflatable mattresses, balls and games in general is prohibited. 7. Music can only be heard with headphones.
